body_html:
francesco@gpu-box:~$ env
SHELL=/bin/bash
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64
PATH=/home/francesco/anaconda3/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:/snap/bin
PWD=/home/francesco
HOME=/home/francesco
_=/usr/bin/env

Yes it's included, AFAIK

body:
```
francesco@gpu-box:~$ env
SHELL=/bin/bash
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64
PATH=/home/francesco/anaconda3/bin:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games:/snap/bin

_=/usr/bin/env
```

Yes it's included, AFAIK
